&XMLWhenFilterLoading; &XMLWhenFilterClosing;
declare @tax_code varchar(32), @k nvarchar(32), @key nvarchar(4000), @q nvarchar(4000) select @tax_code = isnull(tax_code, '') from @@sysDatabaseName..tktchddt where user_name = @user_name select @k = val from options where name = 'm_tax_error_count' select @key = 'error_count >= ' + @k if @tax_code <> '' set @key = @key + ' and tax_code = ''' + replace(rtrim(@tax_code), '''', '') + '''' set @key = dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$GetCheckKey(@key)
select top 0 cast(0 as bit) as tag, tax_code, ngay_hd, so_hd, mau_so, ky_hieu, mst, error_log into #dt from t15$000000
select @q = 'insert into #dt select cast(0 as bit) as tag, rtrim(tax_code) as tax_code, ngay_hd, rtrim(so_hd) as so_hd, rtrim(mau_so) as mau_so, rtrim(ky_hieu) as ky_hieu, rtrim(mst) as mst, rtrim(error_log) as error_log from t15$%Partition where %[' + @key + ']%' exec AI_ERP$Partition$Execute @q, null, 'ngay_hd', @tu_ngay, @den_ngay, @@userID, @@admin
select * from #dt order by ngay_hd, so_hd, mst, mau_so, ky_hieu
